name: Kwartz-Cloud
summary: Acces your Kwartz as a Cloud
description: Kwartz is a school server featuring many services, deployed in French schools. This package makes it easier for sysadmins to integrate a GNU-Linux client machine in a network ruled by a Kwartz service, to allow users to authenticate against the LDAP directory, auto-mount Samba shares for themselves, and for the groups and projects they belong to.
